articles.title: The 2025 MacBook Air Has Never Been So Cheap, Amazon Clears Out Stock at a Record Low Price
articles.excerpt: Apple’s 2025 MacBook Air M4 is now at a record low price on Amazon — $899 only!
articles.content:
Apple is famous for keeping prices close to the chest, especially for its latest releases. That’s why today’s Amazon offer is absolutely crazy: the 2025 MacBook Air 13-inch with the new M4 chip and 256GB storage is today on sale for just $899, which is a full 10% reduction from its regular price of $999...

Launched a Month Ago

Starting from March 2025, the MacBook Air M4 brings Apple’s legendary ultra-slim laptop to the next level...
articles.author: Yakub Jakariya
